Ponsonby Road shooting: Man shot dead, local leaders ‘shocked and saddened’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-road-shooting-man-shot-dead-local-leaders-shocked-and-saddened-top-cop-to-front-media/GV7PXQ6Z7ZHVNNPJRO22Q42SWM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-road-shooting-man-shot-dead-local-leaders-shocked-and-saddened-top-cop-to-front-media/GV7PXQ6Z7ZHVNNPJRO22Q42SWM/ Rachel Maher, George Block'This violence is shocking and it has no place here.' Mon, 06 May 2024 04:06:23 +0000 Police are hunting for this man in relation to the fatal shooting in Ponsonby Rd on Sunday night.

Hastings to gain Popeyes fast-food chicken store, plans reveal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hastings-to-gain-popeyes-fast-food-chicken-store-plans-reveal/WYWG5RRPRJAV5ILU4CQGKDS6EU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hastings-to-gain-popeyes-fast-food-chicken-store-plans-reveal/WYWG5RRPRJAV5ILU4CQGKDS6EU/ Gary Hamilton-IrvinePopeyes has opened its first store in NZ and now has plans for Hastings' chicken lovers. Mon, 06 May 2024 03:25:45 +0000 The site for the new Popeyes fast-food restaurant on Heretaunga St West in Hastings, and design concept plans for the store (inset). Photo / Warren Buckland
Cellphone police sting: Hastings checkpoint catches 20 motorists in just one hour https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cellphone-police-sting-hastings-checkpoint-catches-20-motorists-in-just-one-hour/RBTTYZFHGRBHREU7BVJHU5RUAU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cellphone-police-sting-hastings-checkpoint-catches-20-motorists-in-just-one-hour/RBTTYZFHGRBHREU7BVJHU5RUAU/ Twenty motorists were caught commiting infringements over just 60 minutes. Mon, 06 May 2024 03:19:29 +0000 Police are urging motorists to put their phones away while driving after 20 infringements were issued at this Hastings checkpoint in just a single hour. Photo / Warren Buckland
Duck hunting opening weekend: Two people have guns seized https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/duck-hunting-opening-weekend-two-people-have-guns-seized/6TGLJVKD3VB23NPQYE7WC67HMY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/duck-hunting-opening-weekend-two-people-have-guns-seized/6TGLJVKD3VB23NPQYE7WC67HMY/ Gun seizures aside, Fish & Game said the atmosphere was 'festive' over the weekend. Canterbury feral cat hunting competition returns, bolstered by controversy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/canterbury-feral-cat-hunting-competition-returns-bolstered-by-controversy/O2TW7EZ4JNC7ZB3RGK7HZXOGA4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/canterbury-feral-cat-hunting-competition-returns-bolstered-by-controversy/O2TW7EZ4JNC7ZB3RGK7HZXOGA4/ Ben TomsettNationwide, it is estimated feral cats kill up to 100 million birds each year. Photo / 123RF
